channel.title: Cameroon on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Cameroon on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Frequent failure of adolescent booster responses to tetanus toxoid despite infant immunization: Waning of infancy-induced immune memory?
item.description: Booster vaccines are less effective for those who got their tetanus vaccine during infancy, as compared to those who got vaccinated later in life.
